channel.title: Help? - Edgeville Pkz Source Client
channel.description:
Hi. I have used the Edgeville Pkz Source as a base for my server and I am experiencing a problem with the client. I want a client with PvP Equipment, and when I try connecting with the client I have it kicks me. I tried changing the UID on the client to 0, which a friend told me might help. It did not. It only works with the Edgeville Pkz Client, which will take me forever to code with the models I want. Any help?
Runserver Says this:
Starting PvP Turf... PvP Turf is Online at Port 43594 Connection from 127.0.0.1:52590 [client-1-Sam]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 43 ms] ClientHandler: Client Sam disconnected (127.0.0.1)
That is when I try logging in with a different client than the edgeville pkz one. ANy solutions? This is keeping me from releasing my server onto my VPS.

item.title: Help? - Edgeville Pkz Source Client
item.dc:creator: @mrtms mrtms
item.description:
@mrtms wrote:

No, the port and IP are exactly what they are supposed to be. It lets me login and says the stuff I made it say in the chatbox like ‘Welcome to PvP Turf!’. But then after I login like a second after it shows a blackscreen and the stuff I mentioned before it disconnects me.

Read full topic

item.title: Help? - Edgeville Pkz Source Client
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

[quote=“mrtms, post:1, topic:341540”]Starting PvP Turf…
PvP Turf is Online at Port 43594
Connection from 127.0.0.1:52590
[client-1-Sam]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 43 ms]
ClientHandler: Client Sam disconnected (127.0.0.1)[/quote]
After Ip there is a port to, so i think they don’t match.

Read full topic
